name: Dinner Tonight: Broccoli Rabe With Pepperoni and Breadcrumbs
description: It was a case of mistaken identity. I bought some broccoli rabe at the farmers' market and decided to pull out my brand spanking-new copy of the Silver Spoon to see what I could do. What a perfect choice, I...

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Toss in the broccoli rabe and cook until tender, about 5 minutes. Remove and drain.
Pour the olive oil in a skillet and put the heat on medium. Add the whole garlic cloves and cook until lightly browned, discard.
Add the bread crumbs, pepperoni, and jalapeno. Cook for a couple minutes until aromatic.
Toss the broccoli rabe in the skillet and mix together. Serve up with a pinch of salt.
